custom-action.name: Disconnect
custom-action.description:
This action logoff and disconnects the currently connected user from the Citrix Server.
Possible parameters are: - disconnectTimeoutInMs (required): Maximum timeout in millis to wait for logoff and disconnect from the server. Default value is "60000". - ignoreErrors (required): true of false to ignore disconnection errors. Default value is "false". - secureDelay (optional): Secured delay after a successful disconnect. Default value is "4000". - recyclingIterations (optional): Every X number of iterations, citrix client will be destroyed and a new one will be created. If 0, recycling is disabled. Default value is "25".
